panels.description: Energy consumption of the SLURM jobs over time

targets.expr:
(
sum(
    sum by (hostname)(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules - ((cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    * 
    sum by (hostname) (avg_over_time(slurm_job_allocated_cores{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING"}[$__range:]))
    ) 
+
(sum(
    sum by (hostname)(gpu_energy_consumption_joules - ((gpu_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(gpu_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_gres{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING", gres_type="gpu"})
    ) OR vector(0))
) /3600

sum(
    sum by (hostname)(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules - ((cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    * 
    sum by (hostname) (avg_over_time(rate(slurm_job_total_cpu_seconds_total{jobid=~"$job_id"}[$__rate_interval:])[$__range:]))
    ) / 3600

sum(
    sum by (hostname)(gpu_energy_consumption_joules - ((gpu_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(gpu_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    * on (hostname)
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_gres{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING", gres_type="gpu"})
    ) / 3600

panels.title: Energy Consumption

panels.description: Power consumption of the SLURM jobs over time

targets.expr:
(
sum(
    sum by (hostname)(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules - ((cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    * 
    sum by (hostname) (avg_over_time(slurm_job_allocated_cores{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING"}[$__range:]))
    ) 
+
(sum(
    sum by (hostname)(gpu_energy_consumption_joules - ((gpu_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(gpu_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_gres{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING", gres_type="gpu"})
    ) OR vector(0))
) /3600

sum(
    sum by (hostname)(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules - ((cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(cpu_per_core_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    * 
    sum by (hostname) (avg_over_time(rate(slurm_job_total_cpu_seconds_total{jobid=~"$job_id"}[$__rate_interval:])[$__range:]))
    ) / 3600

sum(
    sum by (hostname)(gpu_energy_consumption_joules - ((gpu_energy_consumption_joules @ start()) or min_over_time(gpu_energy_consumption_joules[$__range])))
    *
    sum by (hostname)(label_replace(slurm_job_gpu_streaming_multiprocessor_usage{jobid=~"$job_id"},"__name__","$1","__name__", "slurm_job_gpu_(.*)") >0)
    ) / 3600

panels.title: Energy Consumption

panels.description: Power consumption of the SLURM jobs over time

targets.expr:
(
sum(
    sum by (hostname) (cpu_per_core_power_consumption_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_cores{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING"})
    )
+
(sum(
    sum by (hostname)(gpu_power_consumption_watts)
    *
    sum by (hostname) (slurm_job_allocated_gres{jobid=~"$job_id", jobstate="RUNNING", gres_type="gpu"})
    ) OR vector(0))
)
